original_text: He gave four carts and eight oxen to the descendants of Merari for their work. Ithamar was the son of Aaron. He had to tell the descendants of Merari the work that they should do.
korean_text: 므라리 자손들에게는 그들의 직임대로 수레 넷과 소 여덟 마리를 주고 제사장 아론의 아들 이다말에게 감독하게 하였으나

sentences.original_text: He gave four carts and eight oxen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 네 대의 수레와 여덟 마리의 소를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Ithamar was the son of Aaron
He had to tell the descendants of Merari
the work that they should do
